verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Now the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel לְֽמִסְפָּרָ֡ם <WH4557> after their number רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> [to wit] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <WH1> fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains הָֽאֲלָפִ֣ים ׀ <WH505> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> and hundreds וְשֹׁטְרֵיהֶם֩ <WH7860> and their officers הַמְשָׁרְתִ֨ים <WH8334> that served אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> any דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> in any matter הַֽמַּחְלְק֗וֹת <WH4256> of the courses הַבָּאָ֤ה <WH935> which came in וְהַיֹּצֵאת֙ <WH3318> and went out חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month בְּחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> by month לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all חָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH2320> throughout all the months הַשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> of the year הַֽמַּחֲלֹ֙קֶת֙ <WH4256> course הָֽאַחַ֔ת <WH259> of every עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

עַ֞ל <WH5921> and הַמַּחֲלֹ֤קֶת <WH4256> course הָרִֽאשׁוֹנָה֙ <WH7223> Over the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> for the first יָֽשָׁבְעָ֖ם <WH3434> [was] Jashobeam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זַבְדִּיאֵ֑ל <WH2068> of Zabdiel וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> Of the children פֶ֗רֶץ <WH6557> of Perez הָרֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> [was] the chief לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> of all the captains הַצְּבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of the host לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> for the first

וְעַ֞ל <WH5921> and over מַחֲלֹ֣קֶת ׀ <WH4256> And over the course הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <WH8145> of the second דּוֹדַ֤י <WH1737> [was] Dodai הָאֲחוֹחִי֙ <WH266> an Ahohite וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and of his course וּמִקְל֖וֹת <WH4732> [was] Mikloth הַנָּגִ֑יד <WH5057> also the ruler וְעַל֙ <WH5921> in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> likewise [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> captain הַצָּבָ֤א <WH6635> of the host הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <WH7992> The third לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> for the third בְּנָיָ֧הוּ <WH1141> [was] Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> priest רֹ֑אשׁ <WH7218> a chief וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

ה֧וּא <WH1931> This בְנָיָ֛הוּ <WH1141> This [is that] Benaiah גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> [who was] mighty הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> [among] the thirty וְעַל־ <WH5921> charge הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <WH7970> and above the thirty וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עַמִּיזָבָ֖ד <WH5990> [was] Ammizabad בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son ס

הָֽרְבִיעִ֞י <WH7243> The fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרְבִיעִ֗י <WH7243> [captain] for the fourth עֲשָׂה־ אֵל֙ <WH6214> [was] Asahel אֲחִ֣י <WH251> the brother יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> of Joab וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <WH2069> and Zebadiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> after וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> him and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הַחַמִישִׁי֙ <WH2549> The fifth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <WH2549> for the fifth הַשַּׂ֖ר <WH8269> captain שַׁמְה֣וּת <WH8049> [was] Shamhuth הַיִּזְרָ֑ח <WH3155> the Izrahite וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <WH8345> The sixth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> [captain] for the sixth עִירָ֥א <WH5896> [was] Ira בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עִקֵּ֖שׁ <WH6142> of Ikkesh הַתְּקוֹעִ֑י <WH8621> the Tekoite וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <WH7637> The seventh לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> [captain] for the seventh חֶ֥לֶץ <WH2503> [was] Helez הַפְּלוֹנִ֖י <WH6397> the Pelonite מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הַשְּׁמִינִי֙ <WH8066> The eighth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <WH8066> [captain] for the eighth סִבְּכַ֥י <WH5444> [was] Sibbecai הַחֻשָׁתִ֖י <WH2843> the Hushathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הַתְּשִׁיעִי֙ <WH8671> The ninth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֔י <WH8671> [captain] for the ninth אֲבִיעֶ֥זֶר <WH44> [was] Abiezer הָעַנְּתֹתִ֖י <WH6069> the Anetothite [לַבֶּנְיְמִינִי כ] (לַבֵּ֣ן ק) (יְמִינִ֑י <WH1145> Benjamite ק) וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הָעֲשִׂירִי֙ <WH6224> The tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <WH6224> [captain] for the tenth מַהְרַ֥י <WH4121> [was] Maharai הַנְּטֽוֹפָתִ֖י <WH5200> the Netophathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> eleven עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> ten לְעַשְׁתֵּ֣י־ <WH6249> eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> month בְּנָיָ֥ה <WH1141> [was] Benaiah הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֖י <WH6553> the Pirathonite מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> ten לִשְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> month חֶלְדַּ֥י <WH2469> [was] Heldai הַנְּטוֹפָתִ֖י <WH5200> the Netophathite לְעָתְנִיאֵ֑ל <WH6274> of Othniel וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <WH4256> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand פ

וְעַל֙ <WH5921> charge שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> Furthermore over the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֣י <WH7206> of the Reubenites נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> the ruler אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH461> [was] Eliezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זִכְרִ֑י <WH2147> of Zichri ס לַשִּׁ֨מְעוֹנִ֔י <WH8099> of the Simeonites שְׁפַטְיָ֖הוּ <WH8203> Shephatiah בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son מַעֲכָֽה׃ <WH4601> of Maachah ס
לְלֵוִ֛י <WH3881> Of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֥ה <WH2811> Hashabiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son קְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH7055> of Kemuel לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> of the Aaronites צָדֽוֹק׃ <WH6659> Zadok ס

לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> Of Judah אֱלִיה֖וּ <WH453> Elihu מֵאֲחֵ֣י <WH251> [one] of the brethren דָוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David לְיִ֨שָׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> of Issachar עָמְרִ֖י <WH6018> Omri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <WH4317> of Michael ס

לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <WH2074> Of Zebulun יִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֖הוּ <WH3460> Ishmaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֹבַדְיָ֑הוּ <WH5662> of Obadiah לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> of Naphtali יְרִימ֖וֹת <WH3406> Jerimoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַזְרִיאֵֽל׃ <WH5837> of Azriel ס

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֖עַ <WH1954> Hoshea בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲזַזְיָ֑הוּ <WH5812> of Azaziah לַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> of the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh יוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּדָיָֽהוּ׃ <WH6305> of Pedaiah ס

לַחֲצִ֤י <WH2677> Of the half הַֽמְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> [tribe] of Manasseh גִּלְעָ֔דָה <WH1568> in Gilead יִדּ֖וֹ <WH3035> Iddo בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זְכַרְיָ֑הוּ <WH2148> of Zechariah ס לְבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin יַעֲשִׂיאֵ֖ל <WH3300> Jaasiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַבְנֵֽר׃ <WH74> of Abner ס

לְדָ֕ן <WH1835> Of Dan עֲזַרְאֵ֖ל <WH5832> Azareel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֑ם <WH3395> of Jeroham אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> These שָׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> These [were] the princes שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not נָשָׂ֤א <WH5375> took דָוִיד֙ <WH1732> But David מִסְפָּרָ֔ם <WH4557> not the number לְמִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> of them from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וּלְמָ֑טָּה <WH4295> and under כִּ֚י <WH3588> because אָמַ֣ר <WH559> had said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God לְהַרְבּ֥וֹת <WH7235> he would increase אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <WH3556> like to the stars הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of the heavens

יוֹאָ֨ב <WH3097> Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֜ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah הֵחֵ֤ל <WH2490> began לִמְנוֹת֙ <WH4487> to number וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not כִלָּ֔ה <WH3615> but he finished וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came בָזֹ֛את <WH2063> for it קֶ֖צֶף <WH7110> not because there fell wrath עַל־ <WH5921> upon יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> was not עָלָה֙ <WH5927> put הַמִּסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> neither was the number בְּמִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> in the account דִּבְרֵֽי־ <WH1697> the account הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of king דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> David ס

וְעַל֙ <WH5921> had charge אֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> treasures הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And over the king's עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH5820> [was] Azmaveth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲדִיאֵ֑ל <WH5717> of Adiel ס וְעַ֣ל <WH5921> had charge הָֽאֹצָר֡וֹת <WH214> and over the storehouses בַּשָּׂדֶ֞ה <WH7704> in the fields בֶּעָרִ֤ים <WH5892> in the cities וּבַכְּפָרִים֙ <WH3723> and in the villages וּבַמִּגְדָּל֔וֹת <WH4026> and in the castles יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> [was] Jehonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֻזִּיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH5818> of Uzziah ס

וְעַ֗ל <WH5921> had charge עֹשֵׂי֙ <WH6213> And over them that did מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> the work הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of the field לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> for tillage הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the ground עֶזְרִ֖י <WH5836> [was] Ezri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כְּלֽוּב׃ <WH3620> of Chelub
